summary: Adds Khajiit and Argonian hands as gloves in a chest in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Khajiit and Argonian Hands as Gloves to Skyrim. You can find 15 of them in a chest under the bridge in Whiterun.

If you find any bugs or mistakes, have a question or have a suggestion for another piece of armor or something else, just write it in the comments.
Since I have no idea how to make models, I can only use resources and try to make textures.
I wont add anything to this mod, but I will fix bugs if I can.
Sorry for my english, I'm german.
author: zoro4661
